name: Feel Great Veggie Soup
description: Choose your fave blend of frozen veggies—go for one with a robust mix. Frozen veggies are a great choice that are full of nutrients, sometimes more than fresh! They make a great base.

ingredients.name: Vegetable Broth Mix or Nourish Broth Mix
Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix or SPG Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer or Round Steamer stir together 4 cups boiling water, broth mix, turmeric, and aioli mix. Finely grate in unpeeled ginger.

Add egg noodles. Microwave on high, uncovered, 6 min. Remove from microwave and stir; cook for 3 more min. Stir in vegetables, edamame and remaining 2 cups boiling water. Microwave until pasta is cooked and veggies are warmed through, about 4 min.
Taste and season with salt and pepper, if desired. Spoon into bowls.
tips: The steamer will be full—handle carefully!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein, and 2 tbsp Epicure Pesto Sauce.

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Roasted Garlic Aioli Mix
summary: A creamy roasted garlic condiment for your burger, sandwich or use as a dip for fries or veg.

products.name: SPG Seasoning
summary: Salt. Pepper. Garlic. Your go-to for chicken, fish, seafood, roasted potatoes, veggies, & even popcorn!

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
